algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array, greedily incrementing elements to satisfy the strictly increasing condition.
problem_summary_simple: Make an array strictly increasing by incrementing elements with minimum operations.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through the array, ensuring each element is strictly greater than the previous one by incrementing as needed, accumulating the total operations.
key_insights: The problem can be solved greedily by processing the array from left to right.
For each element, if it's not strictly greater than the previous one, increment it to be exactly one greater than the previous.
This greedy approach ensures the minimum number of operations because we only make necessary increments.
